messages.subject: about the list, and people on digests
messages.msgSnippet: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1580 Although I m sorry that some people s mailers repeat the post to which they re replying, and some people are using
messages.messageBody:
Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1580

Although I'm sorry that some people's mailers repeat the post to which
they're replying, and some people are using formatting so the whole message
gets repeated twice on some mailers, it's also a problem when the subject
line is "Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number whatever" because those who
are reading by topics don't know which one's being addressed.

The list can't be perfect for everybody, and maybe can't be perfect for
anybody, but if digests seem best for you, please put something in the
subject line for the rest of us! Thanks.

Sandra
